snippet: The New York City health department has advised patrons who had dessert at Alta between March 23 and Tuesday to be vaccinated.
abstract: New York City health department warns that approximately 450 diners who ate dessert at Alta restaurant on 10th Street in the West Village between March 23 and April 2 may be at risk of contracting hepatitis A and should be vaccinated.
lead_paragraph: The New York City health department has advised patrons who had dessert at Alta between March 23 and Tuesday to be vaccinated.

headline.seo: Hepatitis A Vaccine Urged for Diners at West Village Restaurant
